Summary: Saw a light dancing in the sky
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around January 15th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsComing home from a run to walmart. i noticed a light in the sky, it was dancing and was various colors. i thought it was wierd that it wasn't moving, it was just changing colors. like a blinking christmas light i saw red, blue, green, yellow. i found it wierd that it was sitting there so i went to get my digital camera and took a picture of it. well in the digital camera the lights where all blue and it looked like it was dancing. i went back in, an dcame back out an hour later, and saw it was still there. so i took another picture. and did it again a half hour later, finally at 11:00 pm i went out to see if it was still there, and it wasn't. there is an airport near here, its a private airport, only small planes and helocopters take off from there. on occasion a blimp lands there, but there was no event going on that would have a need for a blimp. helecoptesr are only seen there during the day, at the airport they give tours in them. so what this was that i saw.. i have no idea.
